distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
libimobiledevice, usbmuxd were updated to fix one security issue.

This security issue was fixed:
- CVE-2016-5104: Sockets listening on INADDR_ANY instead of only locally (982014).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: The socket_create function in common/socket.c in libimobiledevice and libusbmuxd allows remote attackers to bypass intended access restrictions and communicate with services on iOS devices by connecting to an IPv4 TCP socket.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
